overview:
Entrepreneur at heart. Actively invests and develops companies in various stages of maturity in various industries focusing initially on New Media, Internet, Chemicals, Telecommunications, Energy and Financial Markets.

Selim Started his carrier as a professional investment banker leading technology based start-ups from seed stage to exits by providing them IPO, M&A and Private Placement advisory services in Israel and in London.

Later he joined Gulman Group; one of the leading family offices in Turkey; and was in charge of strategic business development and portfolio management in various fields from financial markets, through transportation, energy and trading.

In 2004 he acquires Gulman’s chemical division Gultas Chemicals and grew it 22 time fold in 5 years and later established a private label chemical production company called Maxi Chemicals.

In 2005 he founded BenTek Group aiming at T.elecom I.ternet M.edia E.tertainment (TIME) industries. Since than he conducted investments, business development, consulting and value added re-sell for world leading vendors.

During 2005-7; Selim was a co-founder, investor and acting CEO of Qualitest Turkey, one of the world’s leading QA and Testing IT companies.

In January 2011 Selim co-founded BenTek Group’s PEVC Investment arm focusing on T.I.M.E Ventures. BenTek Group’s PEVC provides funding and incubation services for Start-Ups.

Specialties; Wide scope of understanding how things work.
